revised_title: Genetic Analysis of Incompatibility System in Eruca Sativa L.
tldr: This study investigates the incompatibility system in the crucifer Eruca sativa L. and determines that it follows a sporophytic control system. The research involves analyzing F2 and F3 families to understand the genetic basis of the system and its implications for plant breeding and crop development.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Plant Genetics
